channel.title: CVE Feed for Projectworlds Pvt. Limited -- Online Food Ordering System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Projectworlds Pvt. Limited -- Online Food Ordering System

item.title: CVE-2023-45344|2024-09-17T13:09:07.695Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20food%20ordering%20system
item.description: Online Food Ordering System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The '*_balance' parameter of the routers/user-router.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-45323|2024-09-17T13:11:28.757Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20food%20ordering%20system
item.description: Online Food Ordering System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities.Â The 'name' parameter of the routers/add-item.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-45334|2024-09-17T13:09:43.134Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20food%20ordering%20system
item.description: Online Food Ordering System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'status' parameter of the routers/edit-orders.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-45325|2024-09-17T13:10:39.856Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20food%20ordering%20system
item.description: Online Food Ordering System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'address' parameter of the routers/add-users.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.
